page.title: 10TIGH-AN EILEAN HOTEL
page.content: TIGH-AN EILEAN IS A FAMILY RUN HOTEL ON THE SHORES OF LOCH SHIELDAIG. THIS SMALL HOTEL HAS THIRTEEN BEDROOMS. MY FAMILY HAS TWO LITTLE BEDROOMS AT THE TOP OF THE HOTEL IN WHICH WE SLEEP. THE HOTEL OPENS IN APRIL AND CLOSES IN OCTOBER. MY DAD HAS RECENTLY OPENED A BAR NEXT TO THE HOTEL AND IT IS DOING VERY WELL. WE ALSO HAVE A SHOP ON THE OTHER SIDE. WE HAVE PEOPLE STAYING FROM ALL OVER THE WORLD. WE SERVE MEALS IN THE DINING ROOM AND BAR. PEOPLE MEET IN THE BAR. ALL THE FISHERMEN, SHEPHERDS AND WORKERS COME IN TO HAVE A REST AND HAVE A DRINK. OUR CHEF MARCUS IS AN EXELLENT CHEF. HE PUTS ON A THREE COURSE MEAL EVERY EVENING. MY PARENTS ARE ALWAYS VERY BUSY WITH THE HOTEL OR SHOP OR BAR.
